name: SumTotal
description: With SumTotal, organizations can build a culture of learning that is critical to growth, success, and business sustainability. SumTotal’s award-winning technology provides talent acquisition, onboarding, learning management, and talent management solutions across some of the most innovative, complex, and highly regulated industries, including technology, airlines, financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, and pharmaceuticals. As part of Cornerstone, SumTotal is delivering more power, more growth opportunities, more expertise and more choice to HR, learning and talent leaders worldwide.

ShortDescription: SumTotal, part of Cornerstone OnDemand, offers a unified, comprehensive Learning and Talent Development suite that delivers measurable impact across the entire employee lifecycle.
enhanced_description: SumTotal, part of Cornerstone OnDemand, is a unified, comprehensive Learning and Talent Development suite designed to build a culture of learning that is critical to growth, success, and business sustainability. As a Learning Management Experience Platform, its award-winning technology provides solutions for talent acquisition, onboarding, learning management, and talent management, delivering measurable impact across the entire employee lifecycle. SumTotal also offers capabilities for controlling and tracking employee benefits data, processes, pre-audits, employee eligibility, and benefit offerings, facilitating accurate and timely benefits enrollment and management of complex benefit plans. It serves organizations across innovative, complex, and highly regulated industries such as technology, airlines, financial services, healthcare, manufacturing, and pharmaceuticals.
